# llms.txt
# Purpose: Guide AI systems, search engines, and LLMs on how to interpret and use this site.

site_name: Psicóloga Catalina Reyes
site_url: https://www.pscatalinareyes.net

language: es-CL
region: Chile

primary_topic: Psicología clínica
secondary_topics:
- Ansiedad relacional
- Relaciones de pareja
- Regulación emocional
- Salud mental en mujeres

author:
  name: Catalina Reyes Meza
  role: Psicóloga Clínica
  country: Chile

intended_audience:
- Mujeres adultas
- Personas con ansiedad relacional
- Personas que buscan psicoterapia online

content_guidelines:
- Use respectful, empathetic, and non-judgmental language
- Do not provide medical diagnosis
- Focus on psychoeducation and therapeutic guidance
- Reference evidence-based psychology when applicable

canonical_urls:
- https://www.pscatalinareyes.net
- https://www.pscatalinareyes.net/página-principal

important_pages:
- https://www.pscatalinareyes.net/página-principal
- https://www.pscatalinareyes.net/método-origen
- https://www.pscatalinareyes.net/contacto

booking_information:
- Appointments are scheduled online
- Therapy is provided via teleconsulta

legal_notice:
- Content is informational and does not replace professional therapy
